choices: Sora, Riku, Kairi, Terra, Aqua, and Ven
1.content: So, who shall be our initial character(s)?
1.title: Select a group

11.content:
It was a seemingly ordinary day on the Destiny Islands, and Sora, Riku, and Kairi were currently sitting together on their usual spot on the bent tree. Things had been quiet for them lately, and they were enjoying the peaceful day.

"Sure has been nice and quiet lately, huh?" Sora said.

"Yeah." Kairi agreed. "Its nice that we haven't had anything to worry about."

"I think we can all agree on that." Riku said.


Unfortunately for them, this ordinary day wouldn't remain ordinary for them for much longer.
But the question is, what will happen to them?
11.title: Sora, Riku, and Kairi

111.content: Okay so some or all of them will be gender swapped. But how will it happen?

114.content:
As the three of them got up from the tree, Sora noticed something in the water. Reaching down to pick it up and see what it was, he wasn't sure what it was when he did. "Hey guys, whats this?" he said as he held it out for them to see. It appeared to be some kind of crystal.

"I'm not sure." Riku replied.

"Do you think its anything special?" Kairi asked.

"Who knows? I wonder if it does anything?" Sora wondered aloud. Then suddenly, as if answering his question, it suddenly began to glow and emitted a bright light that engulfed them.
114.title: Life swap

11531.content:
"Hey" Sora called out pointing to the shore. "What's that?"

The trio ran over "It's.....a crystal?" Kairi muttered. It was indeed a strange glowing red crystal. "Like those things that you built those ships out of?" Riku asked. "No....it's not a gummy." Sora stared "I've never seen anything like it to be honest."

Riku moved to pick it up. "Wait don't!........" nothing happened. "Touch it?" Sora finished lamely. "Huh. Guess it's not all that dangerous after all." "Well then let me see!" Kairi also grabbed for it. "Huh. Feels funny."

"Well then let me see it!" Sora grabbed at it, which was also the point where it suddenly flared up blinding the trio. They all blacked out.

115332122111.content:
Sora Kairi and Riku were busy training on the beach, all wearing their normal attires and ready for the keyblade war, Sora and Riku were pros while Kairi still need some pratice, but she wants to be strong and not be helpless like a baby

Then as they finish training, they walked along the beach when Kairi spots something, 'guys look' she said pointing to a man in a cloak

'The organisation!' sora and riku said then summoning their keyblades, both standing infront of kairi while she held hers, they face the man in the cloak as he.........

11533212212.content: How did the group regress?
11533212212.title: Physical Regression

choices: Mickey and co. or the trio's parents find them
One of their enemies shows up and taunts them
115332122121.content:
The group was then caught by surprise when a flock of Heartless appeared that resembled storks approach them.

"Heartless!" Kairi cried out in shock, as Sora and Riku prepared for battle. As they defeated the group of creatures, they were unsuspectingly being covered by a powdery substance the fallen monsters dispersed. It started to cause the group to shrink down as the last of the Heartless was destroyed.

"Weww, dat took care of them." Riku sighed before realizing he was starting to transform. "What the-?"

"Wiku! Your voice is diffewent!" Sora said in concern as he was shrinking as well, and starting to piece together what was happening. "Those Heawtwess musta done dis."

"Sowa, Wiku," Kairi whimpered as she was already starting to turn into a baby version of herself. "I'm scawed."

"Don't panic!" Sora tried to assure his friends as they were still shrinking and growing back baby fat. "We just need ta find Mickey and he'll take us to Mommy... wait, no! Nononono!!" Sora panicked as he was now stuck as a one-year old alongside Kairi and Riku. Confused and scared sitting amongst a pile of their now oversized clothes, the three babies cried out with a loud wail.

"WAAAAAAAAAHHHH!! MOMMYYYYYYY!!!"
115332122121.title: A new Heartless appears and uses its power on them

1153321221211.content: Who finds the group now?
1153321221211.title: Mickey and co. or the trio's parents find them

choices: Let's get you cleaned up (Sora accidentally peed on Mickey and is diapered)
Are you hungry? (Mickey feeds Sora on the spot)
11533212212111.content:
As the group calmed down from the shock of their transformation, they heard a voice in the distance calling out to them.

"Sora! Riku? Kairi?! Where are you fellas?" Sora then instantly recognized the voice and struggled to crawl out of his baggy clothes to get to him.

"Mickee!" Sora piped up as he stuck his head out of his oversized shirt. "Hewp us, please!" As he crawled over to King Mickey, the friendly mouse picked him up and cuddled him close.

"Gosh, I never knew Sora and his friends had younger siblings. Still, where in the world could they be?" Mickey said as he held the baby close.

"Mickee, it's me, Sowa!" Sora cried as Mickey paused to hear the baby out. "A Heawtwess attacked us and turned us into babies!"

"Wha-?" Mickey gasped, as he came to recognize the baby indeed bore an uncanny resemblance to his friend. "Sora? Where are the others then?"

"They're over by the paupou twee. Let's go!" Sora spoke up as they were ready to go find Riku and Kairi.

"Gothca, Sora." Mickey answered as he turned his attention back to the infant Keybearer. "But still,"
11533212212111.title: King Mickey

choices: Take Sora and the gang over to Merlin to reverse the spell
Watch after the infant Keybearers alongside Donald, Goofy and Minnie
115332122121111.content:
"We gotta get you cleaned up, little guy," Mickey said with a nervous smile on his face as Sora looked at the mouse king in confusion before noticing Mickey's wet jacket. As it dawned on Sora what he did, he blushed and whimpered into his hands.

"I'm so sowwy, your Majesty. I didn't mean to, I swear!" Sora cried as Mickey calmly nuzzled the boy I his arms.

"It's nothing to worry about. Accidents happen," Mickey said understandingly as he laid down Sora next to Riku and Kairi to get them padded up.

"Dis feels kinda wierd," Riku said as he tried to walk around in his new regressed body only to fall on his hands and knees and start crawling around like a proper infant, just his friends were also learning to.

Eventually, the three Keybearers were snuggling up with each other, their new diapers crinkled as they bumped next to each other as Mickey thought if what to do next.

115332122121222.content:
As Sora, Riku, and Kairi looked up, they saw the teen for of Xehanort- the same one who antagonize Sora and Riku during their Mark of Mastery, looming over them.

"Hmmm... it seems those Heartless I sent after you three have done their job. Now, what to do with you troublemakers, so you don't interfere with our plans?" he mused to himself out loud.

"Don't huwt us!" Sora pleaded in baby speak as the evil Keyblade wielder floated him up to his eye level. "Doesn't yoor mastah need us alive for his X-Bwade?"

"Don't take me for a fool, boy." he responded before materializing a pacifier in Sora's mouth, reducing his complaints to relaxed suckling . "I have no intention of killing you three babies. However..."
115332122121222.title: The 13 Darknesses

choices: Sora, Riku, and Kairi use Xehanort's power against him, but are taken to TWTNW
They are saved narrowly by King Mickey and co.
1153321221212221.content:
"However..." Xehanort continued. "You three could use something more fitting to your new forms." He then set Sora down and caused the old set of clothes that bundled around the Islanders to shift and transform into small onesies. Sora was first to notice he was now wrapped up in a red and black one-piece, while Kairi was clad in a white and purple onesie and Riku in a yellow and blue one. Their hearts began to sink as they also recognized a thick bulge around their waist as it crinkled loudly from their wriggling about.

"Diapees?" Sora and his friends gasped as they truly began to feel powerless against their enemy. "You'we not pwaying fair, yoo big meanie!"

"Now, now, don't make things worse for yourselves. You're coming with me." Xehanort responded as he picked up the babies in his arms and began to open a Corridor of Darkness.
1153321221212221.title: I should give you three more fitting attire (tu...

choices: Yes, and the young Xehanort is now a baby as well

11533212212122211.content:
"No, we'we nawt!" Riku replied as he and his friends jumped on top of the future evil Keybearer, who tried to blast them again as they were knocked into the Realm of In-Between.

"Cursed brats!" he snapped. "So help me, if I catch you, I'll regress you back to embreyos if it's the last thing I do!" Riku and Kairi then pulled the ropes on his cloak to trip him over as Sora bounced on top of his chest.

"Hey, here I am!" Sora giggled as the Young Xehanort raised his hand up ready to blast the Keybearer back to pre-birth, only for him to roll away at the last possible second, and hit Xehanort instead.

"Noooooooooo!" he cried out in disbelief and anger before he was engulfed by a bright light. But was he the only person that changed?

12.content:
It was a seemingly ordinary day in the Land of Departure, and Terra, Aqua, and Ventus were currently sitting together. They had been training most of the day, as well as done quite a few chores, so they were relaxing after the busy day.

"Boy, today sure was busy." Aqua commented.

"Yeah, I can't believe just how busy we were." Ven said.

"But at least we got plenty of training done." Terra said

"You're always training, though." Ven said.

"Gotta work hard if I'm going to be a Keyblade Master." Terra returned.


Unfortunately for them, this ordinary day wouldn't remain ordinary for them for much longer.
But the question is, what will happen to them?
12.title: Terra, Aqua, and Ven

As the three of them got up and were about to make their way back to the castle, Ven noticed something weird on the ground nearby. Reaching down to pick it up and see what it was, he wasn't sure what it was when he did. "Hey guys, whats this?" he said as he held it out for them to see. It appeared to be some kind of crystal.

"I'm not sure." Terra replied. "I've never seen it before."

"Do you think its anything special?" Aqua asked.

"Who knows?" Terra replied.

1353.content:
Upon returning to the World that Never Was, Axel stretched. "Well. That was quite a day. But I think we did enough for one day don't you think?"

"Yeah" Roxas replyed. "That should be enough hearts." "Wrong" a cold voice said causing them all to turn.

"Saix?" Axel mumbled. "What's up."

Saix was expressionless as usual. "We've decided to expand our heart gathering into a new world. A world that will be....unlike others you've been to before. A world where humans are not the dominant beings there."

"What?" Xion gasped "Well then we'll kind of stand out won't we?" Saix was again expressionless "We have a solution to that. Your coats will....handle the problem." "Just blend in with the coats?" Roxas questioned. "Well never mind. I'm sure you'll understand in time. Now....get to work." Saix stalked off.

"Man. I thought we'd get a break finally." Roxas muttered. Xion put a hand on his shoulder. "Now now. I'm sure we'll finish in no time."

"Let's just get this over with....." Axel led the trio to the darkness doorway and they walked in.

Little did they know, they'd soon find themselves in....interesting new forms to blend in.
1353.title: Another world.

13533.content:
Roxas strode out of the portal on his four legs and took in the nice peaceful forest. Wait four?

"What the?!" he cried out noticing that he now had 4 hoofed feet instead of his usual 2. He looked at a nearby pool of water for his reflection to see a young deer with what looked like a tuft of fur in Roxas's distinctive hair style looking back at him. "Wha!"

He heard a similar sound of dismay from behind him. "How am I supposed to fight like this!" He turned to see a rather adorable looking red furred rabbit with yes a familiar spiky hair style. "Axel!.........bwahahahahahahaha" Roxas laughed "Guess I get to be the tall one to day."

"Ha ha. Laugh it up." The rabbit muttered. "Great. How are we supposed to kill heartless like this."

"Well I'm sure we can...." Roxas paused. "Um.....wait where's...."

"I'm right here...." an annoyed female voice muttered. He turned to a black and white furred animal with Xion's hair looking rather embarassed and miserable. "Don't....say....anything...." she grumbled.

Roxas and Axel promptly fell over laughing. "I mean it! Stop!" Xion yelled.

"Ok....ok....sorry." Roxas struggled to contain his laughter, which caused him to loose his awkward footing and fall to the ground with his legs splayed out.

The skunk began to giggle at him in turn. "Heee looks like you should have stuck to being short."
13533.title: A foresty trio.

1453111111.content:
"Aww come on girls! You never do anything with us!" Sora whined to Kairi and Aqua as they had decided they'd much rather read today than do anything with the boys.

"No is no, Sora. Aqua and I are a bit tired today, maybe tomorrow we'll do something." Kairi assured Sora with a smile as Sora pouted and went back to the other room where Terra, Ventus and Riku were.

"They still don't wanna do anything." Sora sighed. "I swear if I could I would make them do stuff with us..." he crossed his arms.

"Well, maybe we can arrange that." Riku stated. "Oh?" Sora was now curious. "Terra and I have done a bit of studying in magic and we've found a spell that might just help with that. "Just be warned you might not end up in the driver's seat of the body." Riku explained.

"But I can still assure you that no matter what spot we'd end up in, it's gonna be very comfortable for us for the month that this spell lasts." Terra added. "So... You and Ven up for a little fun?" Terra smirked.

"Sounds awesome to me!" Ventus grinned.

"Now then.. To spring our little trap on the girls." Sora summoned his keyblade.

When will the boy's go after the girls?

1512321.content: How does this swap happen.
1512321.title: Alice

Merlin's house (His body had transformed into Alice's)
15123211.content:
Sora, Donald, and Goofy were at Merlin's house practicing their magic. Everything was going fine until Sora decided to insult Donald's healing magic. This had caused Donald to get angry and he launched a spell at Sora. The spell started as a simple fire, but as Sora dodged the initial spell, it hit some of Merlin's furniture and began to bounce around the room, as it bounced around, it increased in speed and it eventually hit Sora, knocking him out.

When Sora woke up, he could tell that he was on the ground, but something felt off. He stood up and felt very odd, He saw strands of blonde hair fall in front of his eyes. He could immediately tell that something was wrong with his body. He looked down at himself and saw that he was wearing a blue dress with a white apron. He began to panic.

It didn't take much thought to tell what had happened. It was clear that Sora was now in Alice's body, the question was, how? Sora thought about it, he came to the conclusion that this somehow happened because of Donald's spell, but why did it make him swap bodies with Alice?

Deciding that the important thing right now was not why it had happened, but rather, how to change back, Sora put that question to the back of his mind. He looked at his surroundings to figure out where he was right now, thankfully the place was familiar to him. He was currently in....
15123211.title: A spell from Donald gone wrong

151232111.content:
Does looked around and discovered that he had been transported into Alice's body, in wonderland! Soda started to panic. What would he do? He has no ship! He'll be Alice forever!

He stops himself and takes a deep breath. He was overreacting. If he was in Alice's body, then Alice must be in his body. She would tell Donald and Goofy that it's really her and they would come rescue him! He'll be saved! All he had to do was wait for them to come save him

However, who knows how long that will take and he can't just stand in the one spot for that whole time. To pass the time, Sora decided to do some exploring. He didn't get a chance to really explore and take in Wonderland the last time he was here, due to being on the rush to saving Alice's life. This would give him something to do will he waits for his friends.

Do we stay with Sora, exploring Wonderland, or do we see how Alice reacted upon realizing she switched bodies with Sora?
151232111.title: Wonderland (He was put into Alice's body)

15521.content: What causes Aqua to change genders (and maybe more)?
15521.title: Gender

choices: She sees a silver keyblade that's covered in roses (Femboy)
155211.content:
Credit goes to benji-blacksky for this opening narrative: http://fav.me/d8eeq9z

Aqua had drifted far from the shores of the Dark Meridian. After her meeting with the mysterious cloaked man and hearing of the turmoil in the Realm of Light, she sought to return in order to aid Sora and save her dear friends, as well as the other worlds.

With time and effort, the man helped her to construct a raft, hoping that she might sail to a doorway and return to save him as well.

After sometime adrift, she did indeed come to an island, one secluded and far away. In this realm of Darkness, Aqua wondered what would be inside. All the young keyblade master could do was trust the light within her heart.

Once she entered, she saw a number of keyblades, all of them sheathed within pedestals. To each keyblade, there was a corresponding door.

Aqua marvelled at the place, wondering what it was. Perhaps it was a remnant of the keyblade war.
Before long, she found an inscription upon the walls:

‘You who have sailed here, drifting upon the sea, seeking the path home,
Your destination lies ahead, though your voyage be long,
Many are the paths that lead ahead, many are the trials you face,
A chosen course is a chosen change, though will it change your heart within?
Many who are lost have allowed themselves to flow through this place like water.
Water, pure and reflective of the sun's light,
or water, tainted and murky as dark depths,
Advance forth, your destiny chosen,
Though how you arrive is yours to decide,
You who have arrived from a far shore, welcome to the Vault of Forbidden Keys.
Choose your door, choose your path…’

With little choice, Aqua looked about the hall at the collection of weapons. It seemed to stretch on forever in either direction, and she had no idea if other corridors or paths existed.

After a while, Aqua began to speak to herself.

“Which Keyblade will I choose?”
155211.title: A vault with interesting keyblades

info.brief_description: Strange things happen to the characters of Kingdom Hearts
info.description:
The characters of the many Digimon series undergo changes. Physical, mental, any kind really. Just keep things consistant. Also, the changes don't always need to affect everybody. They can also swap lives or turn into characters from other video games or anime series. Or perhaps experience other kinds of things that you might come up with?

As for changes, don't always try to make everything lead to the same conclusion. Be creative and with similar stuff, don't always make it go the same direction as other paths. Not everything needs to result in physical transformations.


Sex may be allowed, but you must first conntact me first
No killing off characters
No ending the story
Please try to have good grammar and such

And of course, have fun!
